imdb.plot outline: Have you ever wondered what it's like to be struck by lightning or be propelled by hurricane-speed winds? What is it really like inside a burning house? In this fun (and funny!) science series Nigel Latta subjects himself to a variety of 'don't try this at home' experiments to explore some of the more dramatic aspects of fundamental science.
imdb.title: Nigel Latta Blows Stuff Up
akas: Nigel Latta Blows Stuff Up (New Zealand)
